title: Couldn't list directories in path: /models/face-detection
body:
i got an issue,
`[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] CLI parameters passed to ovms server
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] model_path: /models/face-detection
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] model_name: face-detection
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] batch_size: 0
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] shape: auto
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] model_version_policy: 
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] nireq: 0
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] target_device: CPU
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] plugin_config: 
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] gRPC port: 9000
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] REST port: 0
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] REST workers: 24
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] gRPC workers: 1
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] gRPC channel arguments: 
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] log level: DEBUG
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] log path: 
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [debug] Batch size set: false, shape set: true
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [error] Couldn't list directories in path: /models/face-detection
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [error] Couldn't start model manager
[2020-12-09 07:22:53.608] [serving] [error] ovms::ModelManager::Start() Error: The provided base path is invalid or doesn't exists`


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28701457/101598155-b25ac100-3a32-11eb-8c5c-0c58ad25430a.png)

and the commad is :
`docker run --rm -it -v $(pwd)/model:/models/face-detection  -p9000:9000 openvino/model_server:latest  --model_path /models/face-detection --model_name face-detection --port 9000 --log_level DEBUG --shape auto`


i don't know how to set the base path, some one can help me
